overview: Few are able to capture a moment of ecstasy with the same singular thrill director Holly Randall can achieve. Born in Tinseltown, she knows exactly how to fill every frame with the razzle-dazzle and potent pizzazz of a Hollywood blockbuster. In her AE Films directorial debut, Holly is behind the camera for Alexis Texas's long-awaited comeback, Dani Daniels's romp with Ramon, plus scenes featuring Alexa Tomas, Ava Dalush and more.
title: True Erotica
